ELEMENT.AUTHOR: Zoovy
ELEMENT.TITLE: Big vertical thumbs with sortable headers (wide)
ELEMENT.SUMMARY:
Designed to be used for apparel, the layout contains taller thumbnails, name, brand and price. Sortable headers on the product list make it easier for customers to find what they're looking for.
Note - this layout is over 600 pixels wide.

ELEMENT.INIT:
<%

/* override the default INI values here. this gets preprocessed.  */

loadurp("VAR::size"); default($SIZE); initset(SIZE=>$_);
loadurp("VAR::sortby"); default($SORTBY); initset(SORTBY=>$_);

%>
